name: 5 Dice
description:
Are you clever enough to get to the end of the levels? In this game you have 5 dice and you use those dice to either ride or jump your way to victory! This game is all about thinking outside the block, if you come up with a crazy idea on how to win, it may actually be the intended way.

Controls:

AD/Arrow Keys = Move

Space = Jump

Shift = Roll Dice

R = Restart

How does this game fit the theme, "Roll the Dice":

This game takes the word "Roll the Dice" into a whole different category. In this game you have to "Roll on the Dice" to get to the end. Your character rolls a dice to use the dice as a platform, or to end up just rolling on it, either way the whole game is around strategically rolling dice.
